properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 10 at 4:19AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds to 35 knot gales with gusts up to 45
knots and waves 6 to 9 feet possible.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Conneaut OH to Ripley
NY.

* WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
